lyrics.lyric: Like oh my god it fucking sucks
Why can't I be fucking lazy
I know I've gotta make that money
lyrics.tlyric: 我知道我必须挣那些破钱

lyrics.lyric: But nobody fucking told me this
I do the same bullshit each day
So if your job is fucking not what you want for your life
lyrics.tlyric: 所以如果你的工作不是你想要的生活

lyrics.lyric: Then fucking quit that shitty bitch-ass
lyrics.tlyric: 那就立马离开这个混蛋地方

lyrics.lyric: Your boss is gonna make a fuss
Cause y'all ain't got real guts

lyrics.tlyric: 我们死命往公司跑的时候

lyrics.lyric: Move your ass, move it quick
lyrics.tlyric: 🥴你最好给我快点，别磨磨蹭蹭的，

lyrics.lyric: Or i'mma put ya on the list”
I'll do all as you wish
And now here is my diss
Cause I got a single tip:
That no matter what you do
Find the job that really fits
lyrics.tlyric: 一定要找适合自己的工作

lyrics.lyric: And the boss who's not a fool
When you are feeling really sick
Do not circle in the loop
Talk to someone with the wit
Or go balling with your hood

lyrics.tlyric: 这是一首不想上班之歌

lyrics.lyric: For the people in the mood

lyrics.tlyric: 这是一首不想上班之歌

lyrics.lyric: Cause we ain't their fucking tools
lyrics.tlyric: 因为我们不是他们的工具人
这是一首不想上班之歌

lyrics.lyric: Though we have no job to lose
lyrics.tlyric: 虽然我们没有工作可丢
这是一首不想上班之歌

I know I've gotta make that money

[01:38.626]人山人海挤成狗
[01:40.096]手里揣俩窝窝头
[01:41.537]眯眼歪头靠扶手
